text: ```Good morning, I'm very new to HubSpot and I have a question, I'm creating an application in react, using vscode, and unfortunately I can't see where the application is running, in the designer manager the option to view doesn't appear, and I don't know which address goes to the browser```

Reminder: Don’t forget to keep your HubSpot CLI up to date to ensure you have the latest CLI features, bug/usability fixes and performance improvements. • <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/developer-reference/local-development-cli#upgrade|How to upgrade your CLI to the latest version>.
